UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationships of a snake cathelicidin-related peptide, BF-15.
Literature.Author: Chen W, Yang B, Zhou H, Sun L, Dou J, Qian H, Huang W, Mei Y, Han J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=128µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi(MIC=32µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=>256µg/ml)
